ber 1994 .

20 November 1994 .

ters 21 November 1994 .

ters 21 November 1994 .

1994 .

25 November 1994 .

26 November 1994 .

ber 1994 .

26 November 1994 .

Reuters 27 November 1994 .

ters 27 November 1994 .

27 November 1994,

Reuters 27 November 1994 .

Reuters 28 November 1994 .

ers , " Reuters 28 November 1994 .

ters 28 November 1994 .

28 November 1994 .

Reuters 30 November 1994 .

ers," Reuters 30 November 1994.

1994 .

ters 3 December 1994 .

7 December 1994 .

ber 1994 .

1994 .

15 December 1994.

ber 1994 .

17 December 1994 .
“ Bosnian Government Admits Loss of Town in Bihac , " Reuters
19 December 1994 .
Mark Heinrich , “Serbs Rocket Moslem Enclave While Agreeing
Truce," Reuters 20 December 1994 .
2 Reuters, “ Serbs and Moslems Battle in Northwest Bosnia , " by Kurt
Schork , 21 October 1994 .
3 The 15th Bihac Infantry, 17th Kljuc Light Infantry, 1st Drvar Light
Infantry, and 3rd Petrovac Light Infantry Brigades .
Reuters , " Bosnian Army Push Back Serbs Around Bihac, " by Mark
Heinrich , 26 October 1994 .
5 Renamed by the Serbs to Spasovo.
• Renamed by the Serbs to Krupa ni Uni .
? Reuters , “ Bosnian Army Tries to Break Out of Bihac Enclave," by
Mark Heinrich , 27 October 1994 .
